section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purpose of § 22-1314.02, the term:

para.text: “Health professional” means a person licensed to practice a health occupation in the District pursuant to § 3-1201.01.
“Medical facility” includes a hospital, clinic, physician’s office, or other facility that provides health or surgical services.
The chief medical officer of the medical facility or his or her designee;
The chief executive officer of the medical facility or his or her designee;
An agent of the medical facility; or
A law enforcement officer in the performance of his or her official duty.

annotations.annotation: as added Sept. 20, 1996, D.C. Law 11-157, § 2, 43 DCR 3699

For temporary addition of section, see § 2 of the Interference with Medical Facilities and Health Professionals Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1996 (D.C. Act 11-306, July 26, 1996, 43 DCR 4205).
